full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG PA CAN GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS SPU GRI 'BAR BA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA NAS BRGYUD PA'I SENG GDONG MA GTZO 'KHOR GSUM GYI SGRUB THABS SPU GRI 'BAR BA'I 'KHRUL 'KHOR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG SANG RANG PHYOGS PA 'GA' ZHIG GIS RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG THUN MONG MA YIN PA 'DI 'DRA YOD BZHIN DU, ,DE LAS ZAB PA'I SENG GDONG MA'I MAN NGAG ZHIG GZHAN DU YOD SNYAM PAS, GZHAN PHYOGS KYI MAN NGAG ZAB ZAB MOR @012B BTAGS PA'I SHOG 'KHYAG RI GNYIS LA KHYI DANG GLO BA PHRAD PA BZHIN 'JUG PA MTHONG ZHING, RJE BLA MA'I MAN NGAG 'DI LA YANG, KLONGS BSHAGS BSUN BZLOG ,TSOGS BRGYA, ,MI MCHOD SOGS RNYING LUGS KYI RGYAS 'GEBS SNA TSOGS PAS BSLANG PAR BYED PA 'GA' ZHIG KYANG MTHONG NAS, RANG LUGS BTZANG SING 'DI P'I YIG CHA ZHIG 'BRI 'DUN YOD THOG ,NYI CHAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'OD 'BAR DU PHA ROL GYI BSAM SBYOR NGAN PA'I MTHU GTAD SOGS KYI LTAS MTSAN BYUNG BA BZLOG CHED DU, ,SENG GDONG MA DANG, CHAGS LUGS KHRO RGYAL GTZUG TOR 'BAR BA GNYIS KYIS GTZO BA'I PHYIR BZLOG GI SGRUB PA KHAG 'GA' ZHIG 'DZUG 'DUN SKABS, ,KLAG CHOG 'DI LTA BU NYER 'KHOR 'DUG TSUL 'GA' ZHIG GIS MOS PA LA BRTEN NAS, BTZUN GZUGS ^ DHARMA BADZRA GYIS RJE LCANG SKYA GONG MA DANG, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I GTZO 'KHOR GSUM MA'I SGRUB THABS RNAMS GONG 'OG BSGRIGS TE GZHIS KA AO RGYAN GLING DU MGYOGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DON 'GRUB PO,, ,,)
